name: CountDownTimer
0:
”Alexa, Ask count down timer to start”
”Alexa, Ask count down timer to start count down from 5”
”Alexa, Ask count down timer to start count down from 10 to Boom”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: count down timer
des:
Starts a count down timer from the number of choice down to 0. 

If you don't specify a starting number, the count down starts from 10. 

You have an option of specifying a custom word of your choice instead of Zero, Like 'Boom' or 'Blast Off'
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
